conbody.p: Hive Metastore destinationevent generationevent generationHive Metastore destinationThe Hive Metastore destination can generate events that you can use in an event handling stream. When you enable event generation, the destination creates event records each time it changes table structures, icluding when it creates a table, adds a column, or creates a partition. Updates to existing tables, columns and partitions are treated as creates since the destination does not change or delete existing structures. Hive Metastore events can be used with a destination to store information about table structure changes for later uses, such as a processing audit.
